Uses of Interface
Vue.Observer

  • Packages that use Observer 
    Package Description
    moteur
    The package moteur containes the classes of Arbitre, Cards, CardsAJouer, CarteCouleur, CarteValeur, DrawDeck, InvalidNumberException, Jest, Observable, Offer, Player, PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel, Stack, Trophie and Visitor.
    Vue
    Using the concept "VMP", this packages containes the views of the project.

    • Uses of Observer in moteur

      Methods in moteur with parameters of type Observer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Observable.addObserver​(Observer o)
      Adds an observer to the set of observers for this object, provided that it is not the same as some observer already in the set.
      void Observable.deleteObserver​(Observer o)
      Deletes an observer from the set of observers of this object.

    • Uses of Observer in Vue

      Classes in Vue that implement Observer 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  mainFrame
      The class mainFrame is a class who create the main window of the game.It implements the interface Observer in order to update its contents once the game has changed.
      class  VuePlayer
      The class VuePlayer is a class who will set all elements of a player in the windows.
